Package planeair.graph.graphutil

Class PanelCreator

java.lang.Object
planeair.graph.graphutil.PanelCreator
public class PanelCreator extends Object
Class handling the rendering of Graphs and the events on its panel
Author:
Nathan LIEGEON

  • Constructor Details

    • PanelCreator

      public PanelCreator(GraphSAE graph)
      Handles the creation of a view on the graph, giving access to a panel containing this graph, multiple events, shortcuts, zooming, moving around the view...
      Parameters:
      graph - The Graph that will be rendered

    • PanelCreator

      public PanelCreator(GraphSAE graph, boolean inOwnFrame)
      Handles the creation of a view on the graph, giving access to a panel containing this graph, multiple events, shortcuts, zooming, moving around the view...
      Parameters:
      graph - graph you are trying to render
      inOwnFrame - if true the graph will open its own frame, else its viewPanel will have to be added to a JFrame
      See Also:
      • ViewPanel

    • setSelectedStyle

      public static void setSelectedStyle(org.graphstream.graph.Node n)
      Sets the default style for selected nodes.

      This method is synchronized because it might be called twice at the same time which would result in an exception being thrown.
      Parameters:
      n - The Node

    • removeSelectedStyle

      public static void removeSelectedStyle(org.graphstream.graph.Node n)
      Removes all attributes related to the selected node style. This method is synchronized because it might be called twice at the same time which would result in an exception being thrown.
      Parameters:
      n - The node
